Description: Lip and wall sherd of East Greek pottery bowl; fine clay with some silver mica; interior glazed with broad white band on which are three added red lines; outside reserved; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis) (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG1050)
